title: BRIEF-India Steel Minister Says Confident India Will Reach 300 Mln Tonne Steel Output By 2030
text:
BRIEF-India Steel Minister Says Confident India Will Reach 300 Mln Tonne Steel Output By 2030

Commodities 10 minutes ago (Sep 23, 2019 14:01)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India Steel Minister Says Confident India Will Reach 300 Mln Tonne Steel Output By 2030 Sept 23 (Reuters) - India Steel Minister Says: * CONFIDENT INDIA WILL REACH 300 MILLION TONNE STEEL OUTPUT BY 2030 * DON'T WANT RAW MATERIAL RESOURCES TO LEAVE THE COUNTRY * SENDING TEAM TO FAR EAST RUSSIA TO INSPECT COAL QUALITY Further company coverage: [ ]

BRIEF-India Steel Minister Says Confident India Will Reach 300 Mln Tonne Steel Output By 2030
description: BRIEF-India Steel Minister Says Confident India Will Reach 300 Mln Tonne Steel Output By 2030
